positive_base: high quality, detailed, photorealistic, professional lighting, 8k uhd
negative_base: blurry, distorted, low quality, artifacts, watermark, text, signature, bad anatomy, extra limbs, deformed, ugly, poorly drawn

quality_modifiers.high: masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, sharp focus

style_presets.realistic: photorealistic, photo, natural lighting, realistic skin texture
style_presets.studio: studio photography, professional lighting, clean background
